allow: Bash(python3 -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); print(f''''{len(data[""results""][""bindings""])} feeds''''); [print(f''''  - {b[""title""][""value""]}'''') for b in data[''''results''''][''''bindings'''']]")
Bash(python3 -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); [print(f''''{b[""feedTitle""][""value""]}: {b[""title""][""value""][:50]}...'''') for b in data[''''results''''][''''bindings'''']]")
Bash(python3 -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); [print(f''''{b[""feedTitle""][""value""]}: {b[""count""][""value""]} entries'''') for b in data[''''results''''][''''bindings'''']]")

Bash(curl -s -H "Accept: application/sparql-results+json" --user admin:admin123 "http://localhost:3030/semem/query" --data-urlencode "query=PREFIX bm: <http://purl.org/stuff/bm/>
SELECT (COUNT(?bookmark) AS ?count) 
FROM <http://hyperdata.it/content> 
WHERE { ?bookmark a bm:Bookmark }")

Bash(curl -s -H "Accept: application/sparql-results+json" --user admin:admin123 "http://localhost:3030/semem/query" --data-urlencode "query=PREFIX bm: <http://purl.org/stuff/bm/>
SELECT ?p ?o
FROM <http://hyperdata.it/content>
WHERE {
  ?bookmark a bm:Bookmark .
  ?bookmark ?p ?o .
}
LIMIT 30")
